transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Madam Techno Mac Enterprise Ludhiana se bol raha hun.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Madam mera na number jo mere IndiaMART ka number hai wo block hai.
Customer: Koi bhi call aati nahi hai par waha se pata lag jata hai jo aapka lead manager mein ja ke pata lag jata hai ki miscall aayi hui hai.
Executive: Main Ratna baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se aapse discussion hui thi sir meri.
Customer: Achcha Ratna ji Techno Mac bola tha Techno Mac se.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Wo number block hai madam abhi abhi main aap se interation se karwaya tha phone.
Executive: Han, unblock nahi hua?
Customer: Nahi hua ho hi nahi raha fir maine do teen bari try bhi kiya.
Executive: Sir wo aapke phone se hi block hua hai.
Executive: Wo red tha na aap ek bar dekhiye ek bar phone se apne unblock kijiye aur ek bar Truecaller pe bhi ja ke unblock kijiye.
Executive: Aur unblock kar ke fir aap Truecaller us phone se hata dijiye.
Customer: Matlab mere mere phone pe hi hoga?
Executive: Han aapke phone se hi hoga kyunki sir wo aapne phone se block kar diya tha na galti se wo jo red red likh ke aa raha tha block.
Executive: Wo aapke phone se hi ho gaya tha.
Customer: Lekin madam maine abhi usko unblock wo blue colour mein ho gaya hai.
Executive: Han han.
Customer: Then aap kabhi bhi wo milaate hain to.
Customer: Han abhi dobara fir sir ne kiya phone nahi ja rahi call.
Executive: Achcha to ek bar Truecaller number.
Customer: Han Truecaller pe dekhiye.
Customer: Truecaller pe ja ke karun?
Executive: Han ek bar Truecaller pe bhi ja ke dekhiye.
Customer: Usse ho jata hai?
Executive: Waha pe bhi block hota hai na sir isiliye keh rahi hun.
Customer: Waha par to show kar raha hai block karne ke liye bol raha hai.
Executive: Block karne ke liye bol raha hai nahi sir mat kijiye ga.
Executive: Abhi kya kya show kar raha hai jab call karte hain aap?
Customer: To unavailable bol raha hai this number matlab.
Customer: Sir yahi bol raha hai.
Customer: To wahi bol raha hai ki unavailable this number.
Executive: Unavailable bata raha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Samajh se to bahar hai.
Customer: Kaise pata lagega fir?
Executive: Aap mujhe WhatsApp pe screenshot bhej sakte hain sir wo block wala us bina Truecaller ke bhi aur Truecaller ke bhi.
Customer: Han ji.
Executive: Han ek bar aap mujhe screenshot bhejiye.
Executive: Mere WhatsApp number hai aapke pass?
Customer: WhatsApp number?
Executive: Han.
Customer: Han hai mere pass number aapko WhatsApp pe call karun?
Executive: Nahi nahi aap mujhe waha pe screenshot bhej dijiye.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Main dekhti hun.
Customer: Idhar jo actual phone se karte hain waha pe blue dikha raha hai IndiaMART se red dikha raha hai.
Executive: Kaha par red dikha raha hai sir?
Customer: Ek minute hold kijiye dikhaun Truecaller.
Customer: True sorry Truecaller pe bhi blue hi dikha raha hai.
Executive: Truecaller pe bhi blue dikha raha hai na aap mujhe dono screenshot dijiye aise hi phone pe reh ke.
Customer: Ye dekhiye maine bheja hai aapko ye dekhiye.
Customer: Ye dekhiye blue colour mein dikha raha hai.
Customer: Ye Truecaller ka scene hai.
Executive: Blue dikh raha hai dekhiye.
Customer: Han yaha pe blue hai.
Customer: Aur block karne ke liye bol raha hai dekhiye dhyan se.
Executive: Han han aur phone pe hi hat gaya hai na?
Customer: Phone pe bhi try kiya tha to phone pe bhi aise hi aa raha hai dekho.
Executive: Han aap call kar rahe hain to unavailable bata raha hai.
Customer: Han.
Executive: Ek bar Truecaller pe ja ke sir uninstall kar dijiye.
Customer: Truecaller uninstall kar dun?
Executive: Han fir ek bar call kijiye.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Uninstall kar ke call kar ke aap mujhe
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART number is blocked.

- No calls are being received.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to unblock from phone settings.

- Executive asked to uninstall Truecaller.

- Customer sent screenshots on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will uninstall Truecaller and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- number block, truecaller, unavailable, whatsapp
